evidence.claim: The company uses AWS for their cloud infrastructure to ensure scalability and reliability.
Priority Care Alliance is HIPAA compliant, indicating the handling of protected health information (PHI).
The system supports X12 EDI transactions, particularly for billing and claims processing.
Interoperability features include HL7 FHIR standards to facilitate data exchange between healthcare systems.
They employ REST APIs for seamless integration with electronic health records (EHR) systems.

icp.icp_reason: No public evidence found suggesting use of X12 transactions or clearinghouse services.
